channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 02:20 Driven the anxiety to the Odesa region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 游릭 02:20 Driven the anxiety to the Odesa region.Creck on further messages.#Odessa_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 02:19 Dumping anxiety in the Kherson region. Stop by further messages.
